# Custom GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This repository implements a content automation tool for multi-platform content strategy (HelloComp 2026). The tool helps automate content creation, management, and distribution across multiple platforms.

## Repository Structure
- This is a new repository that is currently being set up
- Follow standard best practices for code organization
- Keep the codebase clean and maintainable

## Build & Test
- When build scripts are added, document them here
- When test frameworks are configured, run tests before committing
- Ensure all code changes are properly tested

## Code Style
- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Add comments for complex logic
- Follow language-specific best practices
- Use meaningful variable and function names
- Keep functions small and focused on a single responsibility

## Pull Requests
- All changes should be made through pull requests
- Provide clear descriptions of what was changed and why
- Ensure code is properly tested before requesting review
- Address all review comments before merging

## Development Workflow
- Create feature branches for new work
- Commit changes frequently with clear commit messages
- Keep commits focused and atomic
- Pull latest changes before starting new work

## General Guidelines
- Prioritize code quality and maintainability
- Document complex functionality
- Consider edge cases and error handling
- Security is important - avoid hardcoding secrets or sensitive data
- Be mindful of dependencies - only add what's necessary
